title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cook bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Add hot pasta to the bacon and remove from heat.
Mix in the egg mixture quickly to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken pieces cooked in a smooth, creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Grill or pan-cook the chicken until browned.
Heat butter, add spices, and cook tomato puree.
Add cream to form a rich sauce.
Add chicken pieces and simmer for 10â€“15 minutes.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick Asian-style stir fry with tender beef strips and colorful vegetables.
instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and a bit of cornstarch.
Stir fry beef on high heat until lightly browned.
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp.
Add garlic and more soy sauce if needed.
Mix and serve with rice or noodles.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy toast topped with mashed avocado and seasonings.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with lime and salt.
Spread the avocado mix on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
summary: Savory fried rice tossed with shrimp, eggs, peas, and soy sauce.
instructions: Cook shrimp until pink and set aside.
Scramble eggs in a pan.
Add rice and vegetables to the pan.
Stir in soy sauce.
Add shrimp back and mix well.

title: Vegetable Soup
summary: A warm and hearty blend of vegetables cooked in a light broth.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into small pieces.
Heat broth in a pot.
Add vegetables and simmer until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy golden pancakes perfect with honey, syrup, or berries.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter separately.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Pour batter into a heated pan.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook the other side.
